questions.question: Considering the overall packaging, what is the dominant color visually presented on the product?

Describe the appearance of the text font, specifically its weight or thickness.
Describe the visual layout of the text elements on the packaging; are they organized in a specific pattern?
Is the visual design of the packaging predominantly simple or complex?
